name: AI Cats
description: Free AI-generated cat images with no usage restrictions

about.overview: The AI Cats API, provided by ai-cats.net, offers free access to AI-generated cat images for use in applications, websites, or creative projects. With no authentication required and no usage restrictions, it is designed for developers and cat enthusiasts to easily integrate unique, high-quality cat images into their work. The API is simple to use and focuses on delivering visually appealing, AI-crafted feline content.
features: No usage restrictions for commercial or personal use
useCases: Enhancing websites with unique cat visuals
Generating content for social media or marketing

endpoints.description: Returns a random AI-generated cat image
Searches for cat images in the database

codeSnippets.python:
import requests
response = requests.get('https://api.ai-cats.net/v1/cat')
with open('cat_image.jpg', 'wb') as f: f.write(response.content)

quickStart: Integrate the image URL into your application

authentication.description: No authentication required; all endpoints are publicly accessible
